member.name: T:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane
member.summary: Abstraction for a Server-Sent Events (SSE) backplane. Enables horizontal scaling by synchronizing events across multiple server instances. Implementations can use Redis, in-memory, RabbitMQ, or any other messaging system.

member.name: M:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane.Subscribe(System.String)
member.summary: Subscribe a local client (SSE connection) to a group. Returns a channel reader for receiving events and a unique subscriber ID.
member.returns: Tuple of channel reader and subscriber ID

member.name: M:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane.Unsubscribe(System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Unsubscribe a local client when the SSE connection closes. Performs cleanup and removes the subscriber from the group.
member.param: The unique subscriber ID from Subscribe()

member.name: M:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane.PublishToGroup(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Publish an event to all subscribers in a specific group across all server instances.
member.param: The group identifier to publish to

member.name: M:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane.PublishToGroups(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Publish an event to multiple groups simultaneously across all server instances. More efficient than calling PublishToGroup() multiple times.

member.name: M:StateleSSE.Abstractions.ISseBackplane.PublishToAll(System.Object)
member.summary: Broadcast an event to all groups and all subscribers across all server instances.
